@Encryption wrote:

Here is the code.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) { if (c.vote == 1) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); } else if (c.vote == 0) { c.sendMessage("You haven't voted.");

Your vote system might be different than mine.

item.title: PI - Command
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

Hey, guys im having a problem on my server! (317, PI)
I am trying to create a command you can only do once a day… and i did a timer thing but nobody else could do anyother commands after they did it.
I have working vote4cash but the claim button just lets you use it over and over and over… here it is:

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("claim")) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); c.sendMessage("Thank You For Voting"); }

Read full topic
